name: Ice Cream! - by Bluebear
description:
***This is a paid app, so that means EVERYTHING’S UNLOCKED!***

Its finally here! After thousands of requests from our Bluebear fans, our latest and greatest game "Ice Cream by Bluebear" is now ready to play!

*** This is a brand new game from the Bluebear Collection. It joins our other popular titles including Candy Bars!, Cotton Candy!, IcePOPS!, and Make Soda! Bluebear's games have been downloaded over 28 million times***

We've taken on board all suggestions, and the result is the best ice cream maker on the App Store.

Make and choose from 3 totally different ice cream making processes, "Scooped Ice Cream", "Soft Serve Ice Cream" and "Ice Cream Sundaes".

"Ice Cream by Bluebear" lets you make your own ice cream from scratch but also pick and mix a huge variety of cones, flavors, and toppings like you would at an ice cream shop.

It's like being in an actual ice cream shop! Choose your ice cream style, decide if you want a cone or a Sundae. There are loads of cones, from chocolate covered ones to candy or marshmallows dipped wafer cones!

Then you need to actually help make the ice cream. Use the machines and add your ingredients to make the flavor of your dreams!

Once your ice cream mix is done in the freezer, you can start scoopin'. Mix and match to fill your cone, add toppings, to make crazy ice cream combinations.

Your ready, Start eating! See if it passes the sweet tooth test!

If all you Bluebear fans like the individual Ice Cream creators, we'll keep adding new ones!

So lets go! Lets start SCOOPIN', Get "Ice Cream by Bluebear" today!

----

This is a paid game so EVERYTHING IS UNLOCKED! There are no ads, and you will receive free updates forever!
